blogs.title: Creating a Simple Webpage with HTML and CSS
blogs.body: To create a simple webpage, All you need is a good knowledsge of html and css.To make your code stand out and readable, especially as a junior developer, you need to ensure you follow  html semantics, ie your code is well arranged for easy readability. According to semantics, Every html document consists of three major parts. The header, main and the footer. The header contains the logo, navbar and any other component that will be rendered at the top of your webpage
blogs.author: Tani
